src:
韓国高官、米に日韓関係改善への協力求める

03 Nov 2019, 10:44

　【バンコク＝田原徳容】米国のスティルウェル国務次官補（東アジア・太平洋担当）は２日、訪問先のタイで韓国外交省の尹淳九（ユンスング）次官補と会談した。両氏は日米韓３か国の連携の重要性を確認し、尹氏は米側に日韓関係改善に向けた協力を求めた。
　会談は、日米韓の首脳や高官が出席する東南アジア諸国連合（ＡＳＥＡＮ）関連の首脳会議に合わせて行われた。米国務省は会談後、両氏が「北朝鮮の非核化での緊密な連携維持を約束し、日米韓の協力の重要性を再確認した」との声明を発表した。韓国外交省によると、尹氏は会談で、「（日韓の）関係改善への過程で米国に可能な役割を果たしてもらいたい」と要請した。
　スティルウェル氏は５日から韓国を訪問する予定で、韓国が通告した日韓の軍事情報包括保護協定（ＧＳＯＭＩＡ）破棄の撤回を求めるとみられる。
text:
Senior Korean officials ask US for cooperation in improving Japan-Korea relations

03 Nov 2019, 10:44

[Bangkok = Norio Tahara] Assistant Secretary of State Stillwell (East Asia / Pacific) in the United States met with Deputy Assistant Secretary Yoon Sung of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Thailand on the 2nd. Both sides confirmed the importance of cooperation between the three countries, Japan and the United States, and Mr. Yang asked the US side for cooperation to improve Japan-Korea relations.
The meeting was held in conjunction with the Southeast Asian Union (ASEAN) -related summit meeting attended by leaders and senior officials from Japan, the United States, and Korea. After the meeting, the U.S. Department of State announced a statement that they “re-confirmed the importance of Japan-US-Korea cooperation by promising to maintain close cooperation in the denuclearization of North Korea”. According to the Korean Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Mr. Zhao requested at the meeting that “the United States should play a possible role in the process of improving relations”.
Mr. Stillwell is scheduled to visit Korea from the 5th, and is expected to withdraw the cancellation of the Japan-Korea Military Information Comprehensive Protection Agreement (GSOMIA) announced by Korea.
